game.name: People Playground
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Shoot, stab, burn, poison, tear, vaporise, or crush ragdolls in a large open space.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shoot, stab, burn, poison, tear, vaporise, or crush ragdolls in a large open space.

reviewHighlights.text: If you are mentally ill and want to brutally torture and experiment on people, this game is for you!
This game is so peak and its so fun and I really recommend it for young children
